name: Concert
tagline: Concert is a light-weight control system interface to control beam line devices.
body:
### About

Concert is a light-weight control system interface to control Tango and native
devices. It can be used as a library

``` python
from concert.quantities import q
from concert.devices.motors.crio import LinearMotor

motor = LinearMotor()
motor.position = 10 * q.mm
motor.move(-5 * q.mm)
```

or from a session and within an integrated IPython

    $ concert init session
    $ concert start session
    Welcome to Concert
    This is a new session.

    In [1]: motor.position = 10 * q.mm

    In [2]: dstate
    Out[2]:
    -----------------------------------------
      Name         Parameters
    -----------------------------------------
      Motor         position  10.0 millimeter
                    state     standby
    -----------------------------------------

You can read more about *Concert* in the official [documentation](https://concert.readthedocs.org)

### Installation

Install the latest stable version from PyPI with `pip`

    sudo pip install concert
